summary: Add 2 summonable variations of a Norse Mythology dragon
descriptionHtml:
This mod add 2 summonable variations of a dragon inspired from Norse Mythology : Níðhöggr or Nithhogg.
Níðhöggr : Frost based attacks
Níðhöggr Óðr : Fire based attacks

[b]Where to find[/b]: In Whiterun. 2 conjuration spell tomes on a bench next to the Gildergreen tree (check the pics). Considering the Yggdrasil tree Norse myth, i thought it was
fitting to put them there.
[b]Requirements[/b]: Conjuration apprentice level (yeah... i didn't want to give people too many hassles)

[b]Installation[/b]: To install Just extract the contents(including folders) of this rar file into your Skyrim game folder. Comes with an esp file you can check and uncheck in the launch menu.
[youtube]tXFws6x_nOs[/youtube]
[b][color=#ffff00][size=4]Optional[/size][/color]

[/b]*Alduin replacements (you will need the original mod files)
Select the appropriate skin you want as Alduin replacements:Nithhogg Dark Dragon Alduin.esp = Black NithhoggNithhogg Ember Dragon Alduin.esp = Glowing Nithhogg

[b][color=#ff0000][size=4]UPDATE (10/19/2016)[/size][/color][/b]
*Released an update fixing the Sell absorption issue and elemental potency issue preventing the dragons to be summoned. I strongly recommend everyone to install it. It's just an esp file, you need to have the original main files installed.
author: Zerofrost
